guide.summary:
Radon gas is a leading cause of Lung cancer. Charcoal test kits only
give you a small window view to your Radon levels. Radon levels vary
over the year and change with the weather. I've only been able to find
one inexpensive electronic radon gas detect
guide.title: Radon Detector Interface for Arduino
